extendedInfo.description: Reach the sky with a skyscraper building game that will test your reflexes and abilities!Dive into a new experience to get to heaven and make a Tower of Babel as they would be today, different levels based on the cities they have built the tower.Compete with others!Build your tower in your favorite city!â¢ 4 fun game modes:â¨ (1) Noviceâ¨ (2) Amaterâ¨ (3) Advanced(4) Expertâ¢ Controls incredible: gently slide or tap your fingers on the touch screen to place the floors â¨ â¢ Compare your big tower to the most famous structures in the world â¨ â¢ Track your progress and your performance â¨ â¢ Music and sound effects excellentTower Building is a successful and very addictive game.
